About Me

Optimist, loves people & Action Taker.  

Please visit my github for my latest work. I am currently working on version 2 of this website.

My name is Ayo but my friends call me "Mr get sh*t done".

I've been hopelessly immersed in Software Development for over 3 years.

Born and raised in London. I have lots of experience working in and leading teams, I'm also a co-founder of the Stop Holding Back Foundation, a UK charity helping people who have speech disabilities find careers.

Depreciated Projects

Leave Your Mark - Facebook Clone (Full stack)

Technologies
Next.js | Next.Auth | Typescript | Tailwind | Firebase V9

This app acts as a pin board for anyone to use. Think of it like a mood board, a Pinterest-type app with a Facebook user interface. You can share your photos,posts and browse the posts of others.

AyoCodes REST API

Technologies
Javascript | Tailwind CSS | Express | Vercel Deployment Service |

This project was originally built for my other project Ex-Student database.

The original third-party API suddenly stopped working so I decided to create my own API for some of my personal projects going forward.

EX-Student Database Web App

Technologies
REACT | Tailwind CSS | My Own Personal API

A collection of schools want a web application to help them manage the contact information they hold on ex-students. The data was fetched from my own API.

PokeDex & Vs App

Technologies
REACT | Tailwind CSS | React Router V6 | React-Pagination | Axios | Pokemon API

This app was a 2 day build challenge with the task of building a React.js web UI that interfaces with the Pokemon API. I completed the build in 1.9 days. The readMe file in the repo details my experience.

This App is a PokeDex app with an added pokemon comparison feature.The readMe file in the repo details my experience.

All-in-one Dashboard

Technologies
REACT | Tailwind CSS | React Router V6 | Auth0 | XML RSS Data | Open weather API | And many more...

This was a 5 day build challenge. I completed the app in 4.5 days. The readMe file in the repo details my experience.

app was created as a take home project to be completed within 5 days. I love these types of challenges as it's an opportunity to display my current skills and gain some new ones! The read me file in the repo explains my project experience in depth.

App Features:

  1. Get the weather data at your current location with some visuals
  2. Get the latest news via the GNews API and UN RSS feed
  3. View the Italian football league 17/18 Champions League season match results and view what teams beat who
  4. Upload your photos and view them in the main dashboard view
  5. Task Manager - Local Storage and Backend (Express, MongoD options implemented
  6. View the clothes someone wore in the past 1000 days (data visualisation)
  7. API call error states are handled visually
  8. Mobile responsive

Coincora - React Web App

Technologies
REACT | Coingecko API | Material UI | Tailwind CSS

Coincora is a coin forecasting tool and information hub for traversing the crypto market safely and securely.

I'm working on project in my leisure time consistently, and I'm looking for support. Please Click here to support this projects on-going development. Thank you.

Website - Ultra Light/Dark Mode

Technologies
HTML | SASS | JS

Re-envisioned the SASS landing page with a dark and light theme implementation. The darkmode is my favorite version of the website. Local storage automatically saves your choice of theme.

This Website

Technologies
HTML | SASS | JS | BOOTSTRAP V.5

This website was built from ground up and is continually being developed. This was also my first attempt and learning and implementing bootstrap for the very first time.

Ayo Codes - The Blog

Technologies
HTML | SASS | JS | 11ty | Nunjunks | Netlify CMS | Disqus

This was my first time using a static site generator with a headless CMS. We have pagination functionality for every 10 posts. It was challenging at times but I got the job done. Visit the blog to read more about my coding ups and downs.

Microsoft Website 2021

Technologies
HTML | CSS | JS

I had good time building the desktop and mobile versions, emulating the original website as best I could with a few new additions.

Brand Copywriter for Heja

Curious about me

I over 3 years of experience in web and mobile development using a range of technologies. Visit my github to see my latest work

Solving problems.

I also enjoy the excitement of collaborating in teams building tech that adds value to the business.

I'll do my by best to give reasonable estimates and carefully manage expectations, but when the going gets tough, I'll get it done.

Without feedback, I can't grow. Feedback is everything.

I'm a people person. I've worked with a broad range of people from all demographics throughout my working life and have picked up a few relational management skills along the way.

The greatest lesson I've learned when dealing with people is that we all just want to be heard. So I'll always start there.
